# r-tab-pane



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `active`   | `active`   | Whether tab pane is active (set by parent) | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `closable` | `closable` | Whether tab pane can be closed             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether tab pane is disabled               | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`    | `label`    | Tab pane label (display text)              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `lazy`     | `lazy`     | Whether tab pane is lazy loaded            | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `name`     | `name`     | Tab pane name (identifier)                 | `string`  | `undefined` |
